original_text: God saved him from all his troubles and he helped him to live in a wise way. Because of that, Pharaoh, the king of Egypt, liked Joseph. He saw that Joseph was very wise. So Pharaoh gave Joseph authority to rule Egypt and everyone in the king's own house.
korean_text: 그 모든 환난에서 건져내사 애굽 왕 바로 앞에서 은총과 지혜를 주시매 바로가 그를 애굽과 자기 온 집의 통치자로 세웠느니라

sentences.original_text: God saved him from all his troubles
and he helped him to live in a wise way
Pharaoh, the king of Egypt, liked Joseph
He saw that Joseph was very wise
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 요셉이 매우 지혜로운 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: and everyone in the king's own house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕의 집에 있는 모든 사람들을 다스릴
